StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterByNwaID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT rp.Rank_Code as RankCode, p.Last_Name as LastName, p.First_Name as FirstName, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as MiddleName, rp.rowguid as RecruiterID FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp on rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = COALESCE(n.WORKING_RECRUITER_ID,n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p on rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID WHERE n.rowguid =@NwaID
END
